Interface ISProject

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IControl, ISCommon, ISConnect

    public interface ISProject
extends ISCommon
    see ICProject
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getProjectAPI().store(con, project);

      • deleteCustomerTagMatchMapping

        boolean deleteCustomerTagMatchMapping(Connection con,
                                    CustomerDataMapping mapping)
                                      throws SQLException
        Deletes the mapping by the assigned project id.
        Parameters:
        con - Connection to use for this operation.
        mapping - which should be deleted.
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successfull.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

      • loadCustomerDataMapping

        CustomerDataMapping loadCustomerDataMapping(Connection con,
                                          int projectId)
                                            throws SQLException
        Loads the CustomerDataMapping.
        Parameters:
        con - Connection to use for this operation.
        projectId - to load the mapping from.
        Returns:
        the loaded CustomerDataMapping object, if no mapping exists, a new one will be creeated.

        SQLException - if a database access error occurs
